You can here manage the emails that will be sent to the registered users. There are two different types of emails:
Validation email:
This email will be sent when you validate an user, allowing him to participate to the contest.
Rejection email:
This email will be sent when you reject an user. Such an action will close it's account, and the user won't be allowed to participate to the contest.
Markers:
You can use special markers on the email messages, that will be substituted with the user informations. ${firstname}, for the user first name, and ${lastname}, for the user last name.
Please click on the link below to edit the different emails:
